Note: MSDBP and MSSBP are acronyms for "mean systolic blood pressure" and "mean sitting systolic blood pressure", respectively. They are not chemical entities in the classical sense, but they are commonly used terms in medical and scientific contexts to refer to measurements of blood pressure.
